content: materials 2 skeins of purl soho s campo 1 50% wool and 50% organically grown cotton each skein is approximately 120 yards/ 100 grams - color a 1 skein approximately 120 total yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 120 total yards required you ll also need - us 8 5 mm 24-inch circular needles 2 - a stitch marker 3 choose from one of our inspiring palettes or pick your own we knit our cowls in heirloom white + buona notte fresh hay + rosa rose and grotto blue + clay rooftop and came up with a few more colorful combos here 4 gauge 14 stitches and 28 rounds 14 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch note you ll need every bit of your 2 skeins for this cowl to ensure your color blocks are approximately the same length we recommend not cutting the yarn for your gauge swatch and re-using it size finished dimensions approximately 23¼ inches circumference x 12½ inches high designed by purl soho designer gaby bush 5 1 https //www purlsoho com/campo html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2023/02/09/in-a-twist-cowl/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/
